page.title: 12 H.M.S. Raleigh cont.1
page.content: [_ is given at a much higher level in these courses.Also the supply school is based there.With this great number of courses 23,000 people pass through Raleigh each year. The new entrants who enter the Royal Navy do a 7 week course,5 weeks in the case of the W.R.N.S. In this time they have to learn to live together,learn to look after and store their kit according to the naval standards.They have to learn naval general knowledge and reach a required standard in English and Maths.They have to become physically fit and pass the Navy's swimming test.They also go on expeditions to Dartmoor and camp at Peir Cellars,the boys learn to fire various weapons. After their basic training the new entrants have a passing out parade and most go for more training at other _]
